title: # 484 - Blake Webber & ME
description:
Today, I sit down with comedian Blake Webber. We talk about our love for golf, Blake’s hilarious viral videos, Aaron Carter’s feet, Blake Vapes, Hasbulla, and much more!

Follow Blake here:

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/blakewebber/ 

Twitter: https://twitter.com/theblakewebber 

 

This episode is brought to you by Ladder life insurance. Go to https://www.ladderlife.com/bert to see if you’re instantly approved. 

 

This episode is also brought to you by 3CHi. Go to http://www.3chi.com and use the code “BERT” at checkout for 5% off your order.
